story:
LEARNING AROUND THE WORLD

  A FUN, INNOVATIVE, AND COSMOPOLITAN EDUCATIONAL MODEL THAT GIVES CHILDREN THE FREEDOM TO THRIVE IN THIS DIGITAL AGE, SURROUNDED BY FAMILY LOVE.


We are pioneering an adventurous educational curriculum for our kids that will span 15 years and 100 countries. Best of all: it’s FREE. Each family member has the freedom to choose what they want to learn – following their curiosity, interests, and goals.

Now we need your help to fund a compelling documentary about our experiences that will inspire others to think outside the box and take risks to live the lives they dream.


GLOBAL CITIZENS

We will be living all over the world, and settle for about one year in each region, so we can learn different cultures, geography, languages, writing, architecture, customs, ecosystems, climate,  traditions, art, economics, politics, industry, trade, human relationships, sports, entertainment. The goal is to teach our children the value of tolerance and mutual respect, and to do our part to build a fair and inclusive world that embraces diversity. Everyone deserves to receive a quality education and to learn the values that will help them become members of the global community.


  Culture                                                        Traditions

       

       Industry                                                                     Ecosystems

     

 Sports                                                     Economy

      

THE FAMILY

The value of the family is at the heart of this project. We get involved very deep in the education of our children, because we share the same experiences; for that reason, we  play  two leading roles, as teachers and as facilitators of resources for each child to achieve their goals. Our task is to encourage in every experience, the practice of perseverance, joy, order and truth to the family and society. We want to grow, learn, explore and discover the world with our children, be best friends to guide them with love, freedom and respect, until they are ready to be independent.

TECHNOLOGY

Technology plays an important role today because it is an efficient way to learn about free and fun way; Also, through the digital world, we can access all kinds of information, courses, tutorials, applications, games etc. immediately, with an incredible amount of possibilities, therefore, it is necessary to develop skills to make the best decisions to their immediate welfare and educational resource.

PROFESSIONAL  EDUCATION

Children coming out from non traditional school systems have the opportunity to join various universities, where a formal certificate is not required, only the commitment and desire to learn, like The Open University of London.

MISSION

Honor and trust in the skills and passions of each individual that encourages them to explore, discover and develop their own talents, skills, and goals; through the practice of a responsible and respectful of the needs of children at different stages of human development, enabling them to live in harmony with nature and the world fatherhood.

 GOALS.

• Promote the development of children through the senses in close contact with nature and their immediate social environment.

• Foster meaningful learning through the experiences of daily life in the different contexts in which they unfold.

• Being happy, creative, enterprising beings with broad vision and competent with themselves and society.

• Training multicultural and cosmopolitan beings who understand the diversity.

• Learn languages.

• Learn to use cutting-edge technology and tools so as to enable them to achieve their personal goals and contribute to the community.

• Create a comprehensive replicable model for other families to share this experience and make significant contributions to existing educational models.

• Combine the spiritual and educational development to integrate it into their daily lives that allows them to be better citizens of the world and caretakers of this planet.

• To live an experience of self-reflection to discover in the world around them and make their contributions to society.

• Create a system of grants so that other families can experience this adventure.


A DOCUMENTARY OF LIFE

We are launching this campaign to raise funds for a documentary that will follow the experiences and behavior of four children at different stages of development, where values are fostered: love, respect, responsibility to enable them to exercise their freedom in decisions according to their interests.

The duration of the documentary will be for 15 years, until the children reach adulthood.

Methodology:

Biannual campaigns conducted by geographic region, and at the end of each semester a documentary where you will see a compilation of learning, development and growth that has taken the family through the various experiences will occur.

We’ll also transmit our experiences and adventures on  YouTube channel 

weekly and on social networks like  Facebook  and twitter.

The first semi-annual campaign begins in UNITED STATES OF AMERICA in January 2016.

This past year we have been touring around Mexico funded by our own resources and with the support of over 50 sponsors. During this journey, we have spent time with several artisan communities and we are interested in working with them and contribute to their economic, cultural and social development. That is why some of the perks we offer are Mexican handcrafts.

HOW FUNDS WILL BE USED

Semestral Budget breakdown

How do you know if your contributions are being well used?

You can follow the project online every day!

If you can’t afford to make a financial contribution, there are other important ways you can help: 

a) You can share in-kind resources such as:

Accommodation, transportation, food, courses, classes, workshops, entertainment or anything you can bring to this project. For in-kind donations, please email: familialopezpalacio@gmail.com

b) If you want to be our teacher, share with us what you know and what you do. It will be a pleasure to meet you.

c) Send this IndieGogo link to your friends and colleagues 

d) join our Facebook page

e) Follow us on  Twitter, retweet, repost and share.


MEET THE FAMILY

We are a Mexican family of 6 members:

            Tania. 38 years.                                             Lalo. 43 years.  

              

                Rodrigo. 11 years.                                    Santiago. 8 years 

         

    

                 Jerónimo. 5 years                                          Diego. 3 years

        


BACKGROUND

We used to have a fairly traditional lifestyle. But when we had kids, our own interest in education was reawakened because we know that is the most important contribution that  as parents we can do for their future. And it had to be an education where they will provide academic knowledge, culture, science and the development of life skills, love and respect for nature, from which to become responsible citizens and caring for their environment.

In seeking for the best education for our children, we tried different systems, such as Montessori, Constructivist and British.

     

We even opened our own alternative school with friends and family called "LA BELLA VERDE", but we closed it after a year because we moved to Tulum, Mexico where we joined families from around the world (Mexico, Argentina, Spain, France, Russia, Cuba, England) and together formed an ecological and multicultural school called "COMUNIDAD DE APRENDIZAJE AMANECER".

                

We conclude that our children were not interested in learning in a classroom (they said it was very boring). After long talks, much research and mainly listen to children, we find the  Unschooling philosophy (learn more), and held  for 2 years.

                 

It was then that we decided to implement this travel philosophy and begin our adventure.

We left everything behind. Home, family, work, friends and lifestyle. This journey has been achieved with very limited financial resources, we have been able to continue with this project thanks to the support of the great people who believe in our learning model.

 

CONTRIBUTOR PERKS

 $3.00 GO FAMILY GO!

Perks are great but, buty you just want to see this project get done. And thanks for helping!

 $9.00 THANK YOU PICTURE

We'll thank you on FACEBOOK and send you a personalized digital picture, so you can post it on your wall!                                                       

 $26.00 PERSONALIZED THANK YOU VIDEO

We’ll make a personalized video thanking for your contribution and post it on Facebook.

 $52.00 SIGNED POSTER

Get the special, limited edition poster, signed by the Family (even our 3-year-old Diego). This poster will only be available to crowd funding supporters. 

            $100.00 BLACK CLAY POTTERY HANDICRAFT

In San Bartolo Coyotepec, we learned how to make Black Clay Pottery. We love this community, so we are creating a special cup for this campaign. By signing up for this perk, you are also helping people from San Bartolo!

          

 $150.00 A HAND EMBROIDERY T-SHIRT

T-shirts hand embroidered by people of an indigenous community. With this award, in addition to support this project, you help succeed an entire Mayan community.

    


 $250.00 ALEBRIJE FROM OAXACA

Alebrijes are brightly colored Oaxacan-Mexican folk art sculptures of fantastical creatures. We are working with an indigenous community to develop this perk!

                       

 $913.00 HANG OUT WITH US

If you want to meet us this is the best way! We will be in your city or town someday soon! We’d love to have a meal with you! PLUS TERNU BABY

 $13,000.00 BE AN ASSOCIATE PRODUCERS

So you want to be our Producer and see this dream come true? Here's your chance to get on the boat and make it happen! We invite you to join the family at any time. You get listed in the credits. We will be shooting almost every day from January 1. PLUS ALL OF THE REWARDS UP TO $ 250

 $91,300.00 A VISIT ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD

For your generous donation, you’ll get a visit from our whole family for one week anywhere in the world. It will be a pleasure to meet you!



ON THE PRESS

       

                 


YOU CAN BE PART OF THIS WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE AND CONTRIBUTE YOUR BIT FOR THE EDUCATION OF OUR CHILDREN AND MANY CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD!


LEARN MORE

Follow us on Facebook

Follow us on twitter

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel


VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL


APRENDIENDO ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO

EL MODELO EDUCATIVO MAS DIVERTIDO, INNOVADOR Y COSMOPOLITA, QUE DA A LOS NIÑOS TOTAL LIBERTAD PARA PROSPERAR EN ESTA ERA DIGITAL, EN UNA ATMOSFERA DE AMOR FAMILIAR 


Somos una familia  realizando un proyecto  de investigación acerca de una forma de aprendizaje libre y divertida, basado en vivencias y experiencias, donde cada niño tiene la libertad de escoger lo que desea aprender, de acuerdo a su curiosidad, necesidades, intereses y metas; siempre y cuando no interfiera con su integridad, seguridad y bienestar. Cada quien tienen el control de su propio aprendizaje y elige el qué, cómo, cuándo, dónde y por qué de su aprendizaje.

CIUDADANOS DEL MUNDO

El proyecto  consiste en vivir en diferentes lugares del mundo y establecernos aproximadamente un año en cada lugar, ya que así podemos conocer de cada región, el idioma, escritura, arquitectura, flora, fauna, clima, cultura, tradiciones, arte, economía, política, industria, comercio, relaciones humanas, deportes, entretenimiento etc.; para enseñar a nuestros hijos el valor de la tolerancia y el respeto mutuo, y con ello construir un mundo más justo e inclusivo que abarque la diversidad. Todos tenemos derecho a recibir una educación de calidad basada en valores como: la paz, la tolerancia, la igualdad, el compañerismo y la solidaridad por mencionar algunos valores básicos y necesarios a partir de los cuales aprendamos a vernos a nosotros mismos como parte de una comunidad global más justa y equitativa.

Cultura                                                           Tradiciones

        

Industria                                                                     Ecosistemas
         

 Deportes                                                Economia

    


LA FAMILIA

El valor de la familia es el corazón  de este proyecto. Los padres nos involucramos de manera muy importante en la enseñanza de nuestros hijos, pues compartimos las mismas experiencias, por tal motivo, jugamos dos papeles primordiales y principales como sus maestros y facilitadores de recursos para que cada niño logre conseguir sus metas. Nuestra tarea es fomentar en todas las experiencias la práctica de la constancia, la alegría  y la verdad para con la familia y la sociedad. Queremos crecer, aprender, explorar y descubrir el mundo con nuestros hijos, ser padres, mejores amigos para poder guiarlos con amor, libertad y respeto; hasta que decidan  ser independientes. 

TECNOLOGÍA

La tecnología juega un papel muy importante en la actualidad, ya que es una forma eficiente para aprender de manera libre y divertida; también, a través del mundo digital, puedes acceder a todo tipo de información, cursos, tutoriales, aplicaciones, juegos etc. de manera inmediata y con una cantidad de posibilidades increíble, por lo tanto, es un recurso formativo necesario para el desarrollo de habilidades que les permitan tomar las mejores decisiones hacia su bienestar inmediato y futuro próximo.

EDUCACIÓN SUPERIOR

Los niños que provienen de sistemas no escolarizados, tienen la oportunidad de ingresar en diversas universidades, donde no es necesario un certificado formal, solo se necesita el compromiso y el deseo de aprender, como en la  Universidad Abierta de Londres  The Open University.

MISIÓN

Honrar y confiar en las habilidades y pasiones de cada individuo, que les motive a explorar, descubrir y desarrollar sus propios talentos, aptitudes, y metas; a través de la práctica de una paternidad responsable y respetuosa de las necesidades de los niños en las distintas etapas del desarrollo humano, que les permita vivir en armonía con la naturaleza y el mundo. 

 OBJETIVOS.

• Promover el desarrollo de los niños a través de los sentidos en estrecho contacto con la naturaleza y su entorno social inmediato.

• Fomentar el aprendizaje significativo a través de las experiencias de la vida diaria en los diferentes contextos en los cuales se desenvuelvan. 

• Formar seres felices, creativos, emprendedores, con amplia visión, competentes con ellos mismos y con la sociedad. 

• Formar seres multiculturales y cosmopolitas que comprendan la diversidad.

• Aprender idiomas. 

• Aprender a utilizar tecnología y herramientas de vanguardia de manera que les permita el logro de sus objetivos personales y una contribución hacia la comunidad. 

• Conjuntar el desarrollo espiritual y educativo para integrarlo en su vida cotidiana que les permita ser mejores ciudadanos del mundo.

• Vivir una experiencia de auto reflexión para descubrirse dentro del mundo que los rodea y realizar sus aportaciones a la sociedad.

• Crear un modelo global replicable y un sistema de becas para que otras familias puedan vivir esta experiencia.


UN DOCUMENTAL DE VIDA

Estamos lanzando esta campaña con INDIEGOGO que nos permitirá obtener recursos para documentar las vivencias y el comportamiento de 4 niños en diferentes etapas del desarrollo, donde se fomentan valores como: el amor, el respeto, la responsabilidad que les permitan ejercer su libertad en la toma de decisiones de acuerdo a sus intereses.

La duración del documental será por 15 años, hasta que los niños alcancen la mayoría de edad.

Metodología: 

Se realizarán campañas semestrales por región geográfica, y al final de cada semestre se producirá un documental donde podrás ver una compilación del aprendizaje, desarrollo y crecimiento que ha tenido la familia a través de las distintas experiencias. 

Otros medios de difusión de las experiencias, vivencias y aventuras será a través de nuestro canal de  Youtube semanalmente y redes sociales como  Facebook  y twitter.

La primera campaña semestral comienza en ESTADOS UNIDOS DE AMÉRICA en enero del 2016. 

Hasta el momento, hemos recorrido México con nuestros propios recursos y con el apoyo de más de 50 patrocinadores durante el 2015. 

Durante este recorrido, hemos tenido la oportunidad de conocer a diferentes comunidades de artesanos y estamos trabajando con ellos para contribuir con su desarrollo económico, cultural y social. Es por eso que algunas de las recompensas que ofrecemos son Artesanías Mexicanas. Así seguiremos conociendo artesanos y comunidades alrededor del mundo con los que podamos tener logros compartidos que permitan un desarrollo comunitario, más inclusivo.


ESQUEMA DE DISTRIBUCIÓN DE TUS PARTICIPACIONES. 

Presupuesto Semestral



¿Cómo saber si tus aportaciones están siendo bien utilizadas?

Por que podrás seguir el proyecto en redes sociales todos los días!

Si  no puedes hacer una contribución financiera, hay otras formas importantes en las que puede ayudar:

a) Puedes compartir con nosotros, recursos en especie  como:

Hospedaje,Transportes, Alimento, Cursos, clases, talleres, Entretenimiento o cualquier cosa  que puedas aportar a este proyecto. Para donativos en especie favor de mandar email a: familialopezpalacio@gmail.com

b) Si quieres ser nuestro maestro, comparte con nosotros lo que tú sabes hacer. ¡Será un Placer conocerte!.

c) Envia este enlace de Indiegogo a tus amigos.

d) Unirte a nuestra página de Facebook.

e) Siguenos en Twitter, retweet, repost y comparte! 


CONOCE A LA FAMILIA

Somos una familia mexicana conformada por 6 miembros:

         Tania 38 años.                                        Lalo 43 años.  

              

                 Rodrigo 11 años.                                    Santiago 8 años.

        

                   Jerónimo 5 años.                                          Diego 3 años.

     


ANTECEDENTES

Teníamos un estilo de vida bastante tradicional: Desde que tuvimos hijos se despertó en nosotros el interés por la Educación, pues sabemos que es la contribución más importante que nosotros como padres le podamos hacer para su futuro. Y tenía que ser una educación donde se les suministraran conocimientos académicos, culturales, científicos además del desarrollo de habilidades para la vida, el amor y el respeto por la naturaleza, a partir de los cuales se conviertan en ciudadanos responsables y cuidadosos de su entorno. En la búsqueda de la mejor educación para nuestros hijos, probamos diferentes sistemas, como: el montessori, constructivista y británico.

      


Más tarde abrimos con nuestros familiares y amigos “La Bella Verde”, una escuela alternativa, se cerró, al cabo de un año porque, cambiamos nuestro lugar de residencia a Tulum Quintana Roo y ahí nos unimos con familias de diferentes lugares del mundo (Mexicanos, Argentinos, Españoles, Franceses, Rusos, Cubanos, Ingleses), donde conocimos diferentes sistemas educativos y formamos la “Comunidad de Aprendizaje Amanecer” una escuela ecológica, multicultural.

     


Llegamos a la conclusión que nuestros hijos  no estaban interesados en aprender dentro de un salón de clases (nos decían que era muy aburrido). Después de largas platicas, mucha investigación y principalmente escuchar a los niños, encontramos la filosofía Unschooling (conoce más) que consiste en aprender de manera libre, en base a experiencias, y la llevamos a cabo por 2 años.

       

Fue entonces que decidimos implementar los viajes a esta filosofía.

Así fué como finalmente surgió este proyecto.

Dejamos atrás todo . Casa, familia, amigos, trabajo y estilo de vida para emprender esta aventura.

Este recorrido lo hemos logrado con recursos económicos muy limitados, pero gracias al apoyo de la gente hemos podido seguir adelante con este sueño.

Prensa

       

               

¡ TÚ PUEDES SER PARTE DE ESTA MARAVILLOSA EXPERIENCIA Y CONTRIBUIR CON TÚ GRANITO DE ARENA A LA EDUCACIÓN DE NUESTROS HIJOS Y DE MUCHOS NIÑOS ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO !



CONOCE MAS ACERCA DE NOSOTROS.

Síguenos en Facebook.

Síguenos en twitter.

Subscríbete en nuestro canal de YouTube.
story_txt:
LEARNING AROUND THE WORLD

  A FUN, INNOVATIVE, AND COSMOPOLITAN EDUCATIONAL MODEL THAT GIVES CHILDREN THE FREEDOM TO THRIVE IN THIS DIGITAL AGE, SURROUNDED BY FAMILY LOVE.









We are
pioneering an adventurous educational curriculum for our kids that will span 15
years and 100 countries. Best of all: it’s FREE. Each family member
has the freedom to choose what they want to learn – following their curiosity,
interests, and goals.
Now we
need your help to fund a compelling documentary about our experiences that
will inspire others to think outside the box and take risks to live the lives
they dream.



GLOBAL
CITIZENS


We will
be living all over the world, and settle for about one year in each region, so we can learn different cultures, geography, languages, writing, architecture, customs, ecosystems, climate,
 traditions, art, economics, politics, industry, trade, human
relationships, sports, entertainment. The goal is to teach our children the
value of tolerance and mutual respect, and to do our part to build a fair and
inclusive world that embraces diversity. Everyone deserves to receive a quality
education and to learn the values that will help them become members of the
global community.
  Culture                    
                     
             Traditions
       
       Industry                                                                     Ecosystems

     

 Sports                                                     Economy


      
THE FAMILY
The value of the family is at the heart of this project. We get involved very deep in the education of our children, because we share the same experiences; for that reason, we  play  two leading roles, as teachers and as facilitators of resources for each child to achieve their goals. Our task is to encourage in every experience, the practice of perseverance, joy, order and truth to the family and society. We want to grow, learn, explore and discover the world with our children, be best friends to guide them with love, freedom and respect, until
they are ready to be independent.
TECHNOLOGY
Technology plays an important role
today because it is an efficient way to learn about free and fun way; Also,
through the digital world, we can access all kinds of information, courses,
tutorials, applications, games etc. immediately, with an incredible amount
of possibilities, therefore, it is necessary to develop skills to make the
best decisions to their immediate welfare and educational resource.
PROFESSIONAL  EDUCATION
Children coming out from non traditional
school systems have the opportunity to join various universities, where a
formal certificate is not required, only the commitment and desire to learn,
like The Open University of London.
MISSION
Honor and trust in the skills and passions of each individual that encourages them to explore, discover and develop their own talents, skills, and goals; through the practice of a responsible and respectful of the needs of children at different stages of human development, enabling them to live in harmony with nature and the world fatherhood.
 GOALS.
• Promote the development of children through the senses in close contact with nature and their immediate social environment.
• Foster meaningful learning through the experiences of daily life in the different contexts in which they unfold.
• Being happy, creative, enterprising beings with broad vision and competent with themselves and society.
• Training multicultural and cosmopolitan beings who understand the diversity.
• Learn languages.
• Learn to use cutting-edge technology and tools so as to enable them to achieve their personal goals and contribute to the community.
• Create a comprehensive replicable model for other families to share this experience and make significant contributions to existing educational models.
• Combine the spiritual and educational development to integrate it into their daily lives that allows them to be better citizens of the world and caretakers of this planet.
• To live an experience of self-reflection to discover in the world around them and make their contributions to society.
• Create a system of grants so that other families can experience this adventure.

A DOCUMENTARY OF LIFE
We
are launching this campaign to raise funds for a documentary that will follow
the experiences and behavior of four children at different stages of development, where values are fostered: love, respect, responsibility to enable them to exercise their freedom in decisions according to their interests.
The duration of the documentary will be for 15 years, until the children reach adulthood.
Methodology:
Biannual campaigns conducted by geographic region, and at the end of each semester a documentary where you will see a compilation of learning, development and growth that has taken the family through the various experiences will occur.

We’ll also transmit our experiences and adventures on  YouTube channel  
weekly and on social networks like  Facebook  and twitter.


The first semi-annual campaign begins in UNITED STATES OF AMERICA in January 2016.

This past
year we have been touring around Mexico funded by our own resources and with
the support of over 50 sponsors. During this journey, we have spent time with
several artisan communities and we are interested in working with them and
contribute to their economic, cultural and social development. That is why some
of the perks we offer are Mexican handcrafts.


HOW FUNDS
WILL BE USED
Semestral
Budget breakdown





How do you know if your contributions are being well used?
You can follow the project online every day!
If you can’t afford to make a financial contribution, there are other important ways you can help: 
a) You can share in-kind resources such as:
Accommodation, transportation, food, courses, classes, workshops, entertainment or anything you can bring to this project. For in-kind donations, please email: familialopezpalacio@gmail.com
b) If you want to be our teacher, share with us what you know and what you do. It will be a pleasure to meet you.
c) Send this IndieGogo link to your friends and colleagues 
d) join our Facebook page
e) Follow us on  Twitter, retweet, repost and share.

MEET THE FAMILY
We are a Mexican family of 6 members:
            Tania. 38 years.                                             Lalo. 43 years.  
              
                Rodrigo. 11 years.                                    Santiago. 8 years 
         
    
                 Jerónimo. 5 years  
                     
                 Diego. 3 years
        


BACKGROUND
We
used to have a fairly traditional lifestyle. But when we had kids, our own
interest in education was reawakened because we know that is the most important contribution that  as parents we can do for their future. And it had to be an education where they will provide academic knowledge, culture, science and the development of life skills, love and respect for nature, from which to become responsible citizens and caring for their environment. 
In
seeking for the best education for our children, we tried different systems,
such as Montessori, Constructivist and British.



     


We even
opened our own alternative school with friends and family called "LA
BELLA VERDE", but we closed it after a year because we moved to Tulum, Mexico
where we joined families from around the world (Mexico, Argentina, Spain,
France, Russia, Cuba, England) and together formed an ecological and
multicultural school called "COMUNIDAD DE APRENDIZAJE AMANECER".
                
We conclude that our children were not interested in learning in a classroom (they said it was very boring). After long talks, much research and mainly listen to children, we find the  Unschooling philosophy (learn more), and held  for 2 years.



                 
It was then that we decided to implement this travel philosophy and begin our adventure.
We left everything behind. Home, family, work, friends and lifestyle. This journey has been achieved with very limited financial resources, we have been able to continue with this project thanks to the support of the great people who believe in our learning model.

 $3.00 GO FAMILY GO!
Perks are great but, buty you just want to see this project get done. And thanks for helping!
 $9.00 THANK YOU PICTURE
We'll thank you on FACEBOOK and send you a personalized digital picture, so you can post it on your wall!                                                       
 $26.00 PERSONALIZED THANK YOU VIDEO
We’ll make a personalized video thanking for your contribution and post it on Facebook.
 $52.00 SIGNED POSTER
Get the special, limited edition poster, signed by the Family (even our 3-year-old Diego). This poster will only be available to crowd funding supporters. 

            $100.00 BLACK CLAY POTTERY HANDICRAFT
In San Bartolo Coyotepec, we learned how to make Black Clay Pottery. We love this community, so we are creating a special cup for this campaign. By signing up for this perk, you are also helping people from San Bartolo!

          

 $150.00 A HAND EMBROIDERY T-SHIRT
T-shirts hand embroidered by people of an indigenous community. With this award, in addition to support this project, you help succeed an entire Mayan community.

    


 $250.00 ALEBRIJE FROM OAXACA
Alebrijes are brightly colored Oaxacan-Mexican folk art sculptures of fantastical creatures. We are working with an indigenous community to develop this perk!

                        

 $913.00 HANG OUT WITH US
If you want to meet us this is the best way! We will be in your city or town someday soon! We’d love to have a meal with you! PLUS TERNU BABY

So you want to be our Producer and see this dream come true? Here's your chance to get on the boat and make it happen! We invite you to join the family at any time. You get listed in the credits. We will be shooting almost every day from January 1. PLUS ALL OF THE REWARDS UP TO $ 250
 $91,300.00 A VISIT ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD
For your generous donation, you’ll get a visit from our whole family for one week anywhere in the world. It will be a pleasure to meet you!

YOU CAN BE PART OF THIS
WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE AND CONTRIBUTE YOUR BIT FOR THE EDUCATION OF OUR CHILDREN
AND MANY CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD!

Los niños que provienen de sistemas no escolarizados, tienen la oportunidad de ingresar en diversas universidades, donde no es necesario un certificado formal, solo se necesita el compromiso y el deseo de aprender, como en la  Universidad Abierta de Londres  The Open University.

MISIÓN
Honrar y confiar en las habilidades y pasiones de cada individuo, que les motive a explorar, descubrir y desarrollar sus propios talentos, aptitudes, y metas; a través de la práctica de una paternidad responsable y respetuosa de las necesidades de los niños en las distintas etapas del desarrollo humano, que les permita vivir en armonía con la naturaleza y el mundo. 
 OBJETIVOS.
• Promover el desarrollo de los niños a través de los sentidos en estrecho contacto con la naturaleza y su entorno social inmediato.

• Fomentar el aprendizaje significativo a través de las experiencias de la vida diaria en los diferentes contextos en los cuales se desenvuelvan. 
• Formar seres felices, creativos, emprendedores, con amplia visión, competentes con ellos mismos y con la sociedad. 
• Formar seres multiculturales y cosmopolitas que comprendan la diversidad.
• Aprender idiomas. 
• Aprender a utilizar tecnología y herramientas de vanguardia de manera que les permita el logro de sus objetivos personales y una contribución hacia la comunidad. 
• Conjuntar el desarrollo espiritual y educativo para integrarlo en su vida cotidiana que les permita ser mejores ciudadanos del mundo.
• Vivir una experiencia de auto reflexión para descubrirse dentro del mundo que los rodea y realizar sus aportaciones a la sociedad.
• Crear un modelo global replicable y un sistema de becas para que otras familias puedan vivir esta experiencia.

UN DOCUMENTAL DE VIDA
Estamos lanzando esta campaña con INDIEGOGO que nos permitirá obtener recursos para documentar las vivencias y el comportamiento de 4 niños en diferentes etapas del desarrollo, donde se fomentan valores como: el amor, el respeto, la responsabilidad que les permitan ejercer su libertad en la toma de decisiones de acuerdo a sus intereses.
La duración del documental será por 15 años, hasta que los niños alcancen la mayoría de edad.
Metodología: 
Se realizarán campañas semestrales por región geográfica, y al final de cada semestre se producirá un documental donde podrás ver una compilación del aprendizaje, desarrollo y crecimiento que ha tenido la familia a través de las distintas experiencias. 
Otros medios de difusión de las experiencias, vivencias y aventuras será a través de nuestro canal de  Youtube semanalmente y redes sociales como  Facebook  y twitter.
La primera campaña semestral comienza en ESTADOS UNIDOS DE AMÉRICA en enero del 2016. 
Hasta el momento, hemos recorrido México con nuestros propios recursos y con el apoyo de más de 50 patrocinadores durante el 2015. 
Durante este recorrido, hemos tenido la oportunidad de conocer a diferentes comunidades de artesanos y estamos trabajando con ellos para contribuir con su desarrollo económico, cultural y social. Es por eso que algunas de las recompensas que ofrecemos son Artesanías Mexicanas. Así seguiremos conociendo artesanos y comunidades alrededor del mundo con los que podamos tener logros compartidos que permitan un desarrollo comunitario, más inclusivo.

ESQUEMA DE DISTRIBUCIÓN DE TUS PARTICIPACIONES. 
Presupuesto Semestral


¿Cómo saber si tus aportaciones están siendo bien utilizadas?
Por que podrás seguir el proyecto en redes sociales todos los días!
Si  no puedes hacer una contribución financiera, hay otras formas importantes en las que puede ayudar:
a) Puedes compartir con nosotros, recursos en especie  como:
Hospedaje,Transportes, Alimento, Cursos, clases, talleres, Entretenimiento o cualquier cosa  que puedas aportar a este proyecto. Para donativos en especie favor de mandar email a: familialopezpalacio@gmail.com
b) Si quieres ser nuestro maestro, comparte con nosotros lo que tú sabes hacer. ¡Será un Placer conocerte!.
c) Envia este enlace de Indiegogo a tus amigos.
d) Unirte a nuestra página de Facebook.
e) Siguenos en Twitter, retweet, repost y comparte! 


CONOCE A LA FAMILIA
Somos una familia mexicana conformada por 6 miembros:

         Tania 38 años.                                        Lalo 43 años.  
              
                 Rodrigo 11 años.                                    Santiago 8 años.
        
                   Jerónimo 5 años.                                          Diego 3 años.
     

ANTECEDENTES

Teníamos un estilo de vida bastante tradicional: Desde que tuvimos hijos se
despertó en nosotros el interés por la Educación, pues sabemos que es la
contribución más importante que nosotros como padres le podamos hacer para su
futuro. Y tenía que ser una educación donde se les suministraran conocimientos
académicos, culturales, científicos además del desarrollo de habilidades para
la vida, el amor y el respeto por la naturaleza, a partir de los cuales se
conviertan en ciudadanos responsables y cuidadosos de su entorno. En la
búsqueda de la mejor educación para nuestros hijos, probamos diferentes
sistemas, como: el montessori, constructivista y británico.

      

Más tarde abrimos con
nuestros familiares y amigos “La Bella Verde”, una escuela alternativa, se cerró, al cabo de un año
porque, cambiamos nuestro lugar de residencia a Tulum Quintana Roo y ahí nos unimos
con familias de diferentes lugares del mundo (Mexicanos, Argentinos, Españoles,
Franceses, Rusos, Cubanos, Ingleses), donde conocimos diferentes sistemas
educativos y formamos la “Comunidad de Aprendizaje Amanecer” una escuela
ecológica, multicultural.

     

Llegamos a la conclusión que nuestros hijos  no estaban interesados en aprender dentro de un salón de clases (nos decían que era muy aburrido). Después de largas platicas, mucha investigación y principalmente escuchar a los niños, encontramos la filosofía Unschooling (conoce más) que consiste en aprender de manera libre, en base a experiencias, y la llevamos a cabo por 2 años.

       
Fue entonces que decidimos implementar los viajes a esta filosofía.
Así fué como finalmente surgió este proyecto.
Dejamos atrás todo . Casa, familia, amigos, trabajo y estilo de vida para emprender esta aventura.

Este recorrido lo hemos logrado con recursos económicos muy limitados,
pero gracias al apoyo de la gente hemos podido seguir adelante con este sueño.

Prensa
       
               

¡ TÚ PUEDES SER PARTE DE ESTA MARAVILLOSA EXPERIENCIA Y CONTRIBUIR CON TÚ GRANITO DE ARENA A LA EDUCACIÓN DE NUESTROS HIJOS Y DE MUCHOS NIÑOS ALREDEDOR DEL MUNDO !



CONOCE MAS ACERCA DE NOSOTROS.
Síguenos en Facebook.
Síguenos en twitter.

Subscríbete en nuestro canal de YouTube.

story:
This is me!

I am Okereke Matthew Chukwunaenye, an Igbo from Biafra Land in Nigeria. I am an upcoming and pioneering African writer of Science Fiction novels. I lost my mother at age five and to escape from the hostile and uncaring world that confronts an average motherless child I created an Utopia wherein all my dreams and desires comes true. And, that was the birth of the writer in me.

My Campaign: 600 Free Books to College Students

My dear friends – citizens of the world and one children of the same Mother Earth – I had deliberately climbed the highest mountain any fecund imagination could deduce just facing the fabled “Deep Blue Sea”; and, having reached the pinnacle and blindfolded myself, it is now my uttermost desire to plunged into the yawning chasm of uncertainty awaiting me in the bosom of the unpredictable Sea, not to commit a hara-kiri, no, or indulge in Adrenalin pumping risky behavior, but to test the depth of human kindness.

Recently, on the heels of the explosions in social media and info-web technology, the reading culture of African youths had plummeted drastically and the quality of readily available literature rarely inspires these young minds to venture forth in the New Age beyond the worlds of virtual reality and video games.

Technically, the Science Fiction genre, which I am pioneering in the Mother Continent, is alien to Africa’s literally concept for now.

The Target!

Initially, my desire was to place in the hands of one hundred thousand college and undergraduate students of the world, fifty thousand each, six copies (the complete series) making a total of six hundred thousand copies of the pioneering African sci-fi epic – LA CHIMAERA PROTOCOL (in loving memories of my late parents and relatives) – through a concerted worldwide crowd-funding campaign initiative but the total cost was mind-boggling and so I came down to six copies each for one hundred students totaling six hundred books.

The books in the series include:

1.  The End Game Gamble – Published (389 pages).

2.  The Dark Side of Light – Manuscript ready for editing.

3.  The 0th Angels’ Rising – Manuscript ready for editing.

4.  The Vague Factor’s Edge – Manuscript ready for Editing.

5.  The Omega Point Revolution – Manuscript ready for Editing.

6.  The Timeline Warrior – Manuscript ready for Editing.

Hopefully, with your contributions, the lucky students would be in possession of their copies on or before 16th June, 2016 which marked the 10th year anniversary of my father’s death and on the day I equally wish to remember the over 30 years death of my mother. I don’t have a record of the exact day and month of my mother's death.

Aim and Impact of the Campaign!

This humbling campaign seeks, among others, to achieve the following objectives:

i.  To rekindle the waning interest in youth’s reading culture;

ii. To present as Free Gifts copies of my works to my students who yearn to read me but can't afford the cost of my works;

iii.  To open up the reading space and introduce them into science fiction genre;

iv.  To inspire the youth into tinkering with imaginative insights which a sci-fi affords;

v.  To honor the memories of  my late parents, siblings and relatives for the debts of gratitude I owe them;

vi.  To also use it as an opportunity to promote my works and garner the exposure I need as an unknown sci-fi writer from Africa.

The Magnitude of what your Kindness will Help us Achieve.

i.  To achieve the above aims and objectives of this campaign that is why you are reading this. See budget below.

ii.  To successfully prosecute this notable “Free Book Campaign” I graciously request your kind contributions.

The Budget!

The total cost is approximately $22000

Cost of a book = $20

Shipping cost = $11.99 (32 days delivery time)

Total cost = $31.99. (Cost of book and shipping)

Cost of 600 Books: $20x600 =$12000

Shipping cost of 600 Books: $11.99x600 = $7194

Charges and tax approximately 10%:  $2000

Total cost = $21194 (approximately $22000).

Where the funds go if we don't reach the entire goal.

Every contribution counts. The cost of a book is $31.99 (cost of Book and shipping) so if we realize $31.99 I will send a copy of the books to a student.

If the goal is reached, then the shipping cost for the six hundred books would reduce since the books would be purchased in bulk.

Contributors who wish could also request to personally handle the distribution of their copies to any student(s) of their choice.

Risks & Challenges

Dear friends I am human and I have lots of limitations. These limitations might affect this campaign but I strongly trust the capacity of the human spirit to rise above parochial sentiments. Some of the risks and obstacles I may face include:

·  Lack of trust and confidence from you about my writing ability considering the fact that I am an unknown author.

·  Genuine doubts and reservations on my ability to fulfill the aims and objectives of the campaign.

. Discouragement over low or no support from my family and friends.

What qualifies me to overcome these hurdles?

·  I trust that you know every one great today was once an unknown. Take a look at my work, www.createspace.com/3558194, and encourage me.

·  I am a humble class teacher in a "third world" country but my words are the only thing I could freely give without losing a sleep over fulfilling them. Just as you are reading this so also are my friends and relatives doing and these know I am one who keeps my words.

. Don't be discouraged. You are contributing to a worthwhile course and being the first to contribute will also encourage others to do so. Most of my family and friends had lent their supports in other ways.

My Plan for Solving these Challenges

·  I will encourage contributors to request for copies of the work to share to youths of their choice in that way you will personally experience the joy this campaign seeks to bring to youths across the globe. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Dear friend even if you can't contribute, you can still help by:

·  Spreading the message to men and women of goodwill residing in every door step; every town; every city; every country in any corner of our world – earth.

·  Sharing or re-tweeting the link on all your social network platforms.

·  By using the Indiegogo share tools!

.  By purchasing Published copies from www.createspace.com/3558194

And, that's all there is to it.

My Perks:

Please I humbly invite you to take a FREE Tour of my fifteen specially packaged unique perks and don’t forget to Pick a Perk having come this far with me. It would interest you to know that twelve of these perks are named after the twelve foundation stones of the New Jerusalem in Revelation 21:19-20.

Let’s do it!

The Gift is in you!

Contact Me!

Email: matrixrex@yahoo.com

             okerekematthew@gmail.com

Phone: +2348038652740

www.createspace.com/3558194


...the Future is the Day After Tomorrow; Support it NOW!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Video: Filmed by Nnadi Onyebuchi, https://www.facebook.com/esobuchy?ref=br_rs

Presenter: The lead student in the video is Etim Precious Asuquo. https://www.facebook.com/quincy.patrick.12?fref=ts

Set: The video was made in the premise of the students' school, Radiant Way International School, 25 RD Road, Rumuokwurushi, Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria, with the kind permission of the management (The Director could be reached on +2348079050458).

Child's Rights Protection: None of the children's Rights were infringed upon in the course of filming this video. Those of them in Senior Secondary Classes would be rewarded with copies of the books if the campaign is successful for this project is for them and the Juniors would be entertained with worthwhile treats.

story:
Kea started from a simple idea: there has to be a better way to learn to recognize and identify wildlife.

Birding is the fastest-growing hobby in the United States, and more and more new birders face an intimidating and yet-inaccessible mountain of knowledge.  And for some reason, the best way to learn about a new region's bird life is still just to look through a field guide over and over.  And over.  And over...

Kea changes all that.

The best way to learn anything is through play, period.  Games are the foundations of our earliest learning, and we're naturally inclined towards play as a way to make sense of new information.

Kea uses several different games to build and test growing knowledge of birds with levels that group birds by their habitat or taxonomy.  Anyone can play it for free, starting with the birds they are most likely to see in their own backyards.

Some of the great features we've included (so far)

  • Species coverage from North America, Europe, and Costa Rica (Fully unlocked for less than the cost of a field guide from one of those regions!)

  • Learning Center to allow learners to review all photos and sound recordings at their own pace
  • Beginner's Mode for new birders
  • Level tracking (Watch your progress and earn tokens to unlock new levels!)
  • Advanced birders can polish their skills with Timed Mode, or play using Scientific Names

  • Key field marks to look for when identifying each species
  • Thousands of photographs of different genders and plumages, and hundreds of recordings (with new material being added all the time!)

We're just getting started, but we think we've got a great App, one that makes birding more available to new birders, and that provides experienced birders the chance to get to the next level.

We've got a lot of exciting plans to make the App better and better, and to get there, we're offering deals on unlocking expansions as they come out.  We're also offering a chance to get "behind the curtain" and help direct the future of the App, to build the App you want to see.

Some of the awesome functions we would like to build with crowdsourcing funding:

  • Explore the birds of the world, location by location.  Pick a spot on Earth and play a game to learn the birds in that location
  • Submit your own photos, videos and recordings, and rate submissions from other users
  • Build your own custom levels.  Send them to friends and challenge each other with new quizzes!
  • Complete coverage of all the World's birds in all the world's geographic regions
  • Incorporate several new games and a steady stream of new photographs to continually sharpen skills

On behalf of us at Kea, thank you for taking to the time to check out our campaign, and thanks for helping us build the most fun, geographically inclusive, and just plain best Birding App on Earth!

Oh, and why are we called "Kea"?  

Kea are inventive, curious, precocious, mischievous, and very possibly the smartest birds in the planet.  Unlike most birds, they can solve complex problems involving teamwork, learn from the examples of others, and lead complex social lives.  

So how do they learn all these complex behaviors?  

The same way we do.  Also rare among birds, Keas play!

                                 REWARD LEVELS

For less than the price of a field guide which covers a single region's birds (rather than multiple countries and continents!), we're offering Early Bird specials on all of our expansions as they come out:

 For birders with more of a global interest, we're offering the following rewards (Early Bird special worth 20-40% off!)

 And finally, for those who are interested in helping us create THE birding App that they've always wanted...

The final reward tier gives backers unlimited and lifetime access to all of Kea's present and future geographic expansions, exciting new functions and games, and backstage access to help guide the App to be the one they've always wanted. 

Early birds save more than 90% up front, and keep saving for the rest of their lives!

                               STRETCH GOALS

The more we raise with our crowdsourcing campaign, the faster we can build Kea into the global, diverse App for all levels of birder.  We've set our goal low to make sure we keep improving, but the milestones we hope to hit are:

  • $1,000 Raised:  Begin construction on Australia expansion
  • $2,000 Raised: Begin construction on Australia and Thailand expansion s
  • $3,000 Raised: Begin construction on Australia, Thailand, and Colombia expansion s
  • $4,000 Raised: Begin construction on User Submission and Rating interface
  • $6,000 Raised: Begin construction on Custom Level Builder
  • $8,000 Raised: Begin construction on Global Level Generator
  • $10,000 Raised: Begin construction on levels for all species and countries on Earth
  • $15,000 Raised: Begin construction on all improvements and expansions listed above! 

Thanks so much for your time, attention, and support.  Pass us on to all the interested birders out there!  We hope to see you on Kea soon!

On behalf of us at Kea, thank you for taking to the time to check out our campaign, and thanks for helping us build the most fun, geographically inclusive, and just plain best Birding App on Earth!Oh, and why are we called "Kea"?  Kea are inventive, curious, precocious, mischievous, and very possibly the smartest birds in the planet.  Unlike most birds, they can solve complex problems involving teamwork, learn from the examples of others, and lead complex social lives.  So how do they learn all these complex behaviors?  The same way we do.  Also rare among birds, Keas play!Our mascot: the clever, the plucky, the playful, the Kea. Photo by Gopal Vijayaraghavan                                 REWARD LEVELSFor less than the price of a field guide which covers a single region's birds (rather than multiple countries and continents!), we're offering Early Bird specials on all of our expansions as they come out: For birders with more of a global interest, we're offering the following rewards (Early Bird special worth 20-40% off!) And finally, for those who are interested in helping us create THE birding App that they've always wanted...The final reward tier gives backers unlimited and lifetime access to all of Kea's present and future geographic expansions, exciting new functions and games, and backstage access to help guide the App to be the one they've always wanted. Early birds save more than 90% up front, and keep saving for the rest of their lives!                               STRETCH GOALSThe more we raise with our crowdsourcing campaign, the faster we can build Kea into the global, diverse App for all levels of birder.  We've set our goal low to make sure we keep improving, but the milestones we hope to hit are:

$1,000 Raised:  Begin construction on Australia expansion

$2,000 Raised: Begin construction on Australia and Thailand expansion s

$3,000 Raised: Begin construction on Australia, Thailand, and Colombia expansion s

$4,000 Raised: Begin construction on User Submission and Rating interface

$6,000 Raised: Begin construction on Custom Level Builder

$8,000 Raised: Begin construction on Global Level Generator

$10,000 Raised: Begin construction on levels for all species and countries on Earth

$15,000 Raised: Begin construction on all improvements and expansions listed above! 
Thanks so much for your time, attention, and support.  Pass us on to all the interested birders out there!  We hope to see you on Kea soon!

story:
PLEASE DONATE TO MAKE WHARTON LATIN AMERICA WEEKEND THE BEST POSSIBLE STUDENT RUN CONFERENCE!

Wharton Latin America Weekend (WLAW), with the support of Wharton’s Latin America Student Association (WHALASA), is a 3 day summit which includes:

  • Latin America Conference

  • Start-up Competition

  • Private Equity Competition

  • Career Fair


WLAW brings together students interested in Latin American opportunities so they can deepen their business knowledge and expand their professional network in the region.

Last year, leaders such Pedro Aspe (CEO of Evercore Partners), Wood Staton (CEO and Chairman of Arcos Dorados), and Hilda Ochoa-Brillembourg (Founder of Strategic Investment Group) shared best practices and leadership advice on succeeding in Latin America to 250+ students and professionals from all over the world.

We ask for your support to make this the best Latin American Conference not only for this year but also for the years to come!

story:
“Children did not evolve to sit quietly at desks in age-segregated classrooms being instructed by unrelated and unfamiliar adults.” - David Bjorklund

 

Why build a school?

The Evolution Institute believes that an evolutionary perspective can shed light on how instructional approaches, curricular materials, and educational context may be maladaptive for learning in contemporary classrooms. It can also teach us how to adapt the classroom for learning the way we evolved to learn. 

Building upon the past successes, we plan to build a secular public school in the East Tampa area where the children will be in a learning environment built on a foundation of practical knowledge, experience, and science. The latter includes current research in brain development, literacy learning, and the development of social and emotional skills. 

Why is it needed?
By third grade 80% of the students are failing in this neighborhood in East Tampa. Numerous studies have shown that kids who are doing poorly in school at this age are likely to continue to do so in high school and beyond.  

Bringing together the caring and supportive environment that our community partnership creates, with a sound scientific approach, will build on past successes to create a replicable and scalable model. 

Who will we serve?

This early learning center will serve children from 3 years old through second grade.  Instead of an 80% failure rate, the students will be at or above grade level by the time they graduate this program. Many will transfer to area public schools where they will arrive prepared for the rigors of traditional education and standardized assessment.

Why focus on this age?

These are the critical foundation years for kids.  In fact, 85% of brain development occurs before the age of 5! When the proper foundation is built, children are more likely do well in school for the rest of their school career and beyond. They will have developed the foundation for literacy and math skills; and they will have developed the basic social and emotional skills to work in teams and to address conflict.

How much is needed?

Right now we are raising $25,000 to complete the school building and Phase I outlined below.
 

What is the timeline?

- Phase I – ground broken in Winter 2016, with Kindergarten and 1st grades opening in Fall 2017
- Phase II – opening of 2nd grade program Fall, 2018
- Phase III – opening of 3 year-old and Pre-K programs in Fall, 2019

What is unique about this effort?
The current system has a relatively incoherent approach to these early years where no one agency is empowered to address the children’s needs. In low income areas, children frequently are in three separate education systems by the time they reach elementary school.  While they may have success in one of the systems, it does not necessarily translate to success in the next system. We see by the data that many children are unprepared for school success. One of the unique aspects of our project is spanning this gap between early systems in order to assure continuity and success as they transition between systems. 

A second unique aspect is the partnership between the scientific community and the practitioners.  This is not always an easy task but one that we have extensive experience with.  This creates a process that allows for translation of science into practice. Further, it helps advance the science through the feedback and information learned from the practitioners. 

All of this leads to the most important aspect: the children will be in a learning environment built on a foundation of practical knowledge, experience, and science. The latter includes current research in brain development, literacy learning, and the development of social and emotional skills. The school will look different from other schools, especially as we get into the K-2 years. This marriage of on-the-ground practitioners and the academic world is a critical piece in creating a successful model. 

What are our qualifications? 

The Evolution Institute and Bible Truth Ministries sound like an odd couple.  One is faith-based and the other has a perspective that many think is at odds with faith.  However, we have worked together for years with a common goal – improving the lives of the residents of East Tampa.  

Bible Truth Ministries is led by Daniel Dean, a Bank of America hero award winner. Reverend Dean, along with his wife Suzette, built a private faith-based school that serves children from birth through 12th grade. The students are almost entirely scholarship students (Step Up for Students, Florida’s plan to support low-income students in private school as an alternative to the public schools, and MacKay Scholarship for students with special needs). The school consistently outperforms the public schools in the same neighborhood. 

The Evolution Institute (EI) was cofounded by leaders in their respective fields to bring scientific knowledge into practical applications to improve quality of life for people across the globe. The EI has sponsored five conferences on youth and education that brought together researchers from around the world. This has resulted in scientific publications, a book, and an applied program that saw students, who had been failing at least three of their core course, achieve grade parity within a year due to the redesign of the classroom environment around scientific principles. We have science advisors who are leaders in their field who have committed to assist with the project. Additionally, we have received endorsements from some of the leading scientists of our generation and worked with a Nobel Laureate in designing our prior school project. We bring individuals with extensive experience in school programming, administration, teaching, prevention programming, as well as research and organizational development. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Spread the word! Share our campaign with everyone and anyone. Your support, be it monetary or through advocacy, is greatly appreciated and will impact the rest of these children's lives. Thank you!

story:
Introduction

Hong Kong's emblem is the beautiful Bauhinia flower and appears on our flag. This is the flower of the orchid tree Bauhinia blakeana, which was first discovered in Hong Kong. What many people may not know is that it is a sterile hybrid, and how and why it ended up in Hong Kong is shrouded in mystery.

One of the best ways to help uncover the secrets of any organism is by understanding its genetic makeup. Genomics, sequencing of the genetic code of organisms, provides a complete look into the genetic complement of any species. It is also one of the key technologies that will define the 21st century. While Hong Kong has made major advances in this field, the general public may have little awareness and understanding of what this field even is.

By bringing together the emblematic and mysterious Bauhinia flower and the power and knowledge of genome technology, we can build a bridge between science and community— enlightening our understanding of this plant’s interesting biology and informing and educating the public about this exciting and rapidly advancing field.

To build such a collaborative endeavour, we are launching the Hong Kong genome project through which we will sequence the genome of the Hong Kong emblem to better understand where it came from; train local students to assemble and analyse the data — crucial skills needed for this field to advance; and engage the public through local pride.

This will be the first Hong Kong genome project: funded by the public; sequenced in Hong Kong; assembled and analysed by local students; and directly shared with the public. We also welcome contributions and interest from the rest of the world, hoping this serves as a model to inspire and inform other national genome projects, and aid the development of crucial genomic literacy and skills across the globe, inspiring and training a new generation of scientists to use these tools to tackle the biggest threats to mankind: climate change, disease, and food security.

Why Bauhinia?
The flower of Bauhinia blakeana was adopted as the emblem of Hong Kong in 1965 and, since 1997, has been part of the flag of the Hong Kong SAR. The tree was first discovered by a French missionary, Father Jean-Marie Delavay, in the 1880s, growing on the West of Hong Kong Island.  The missionary collector subsequently propagated it in the grounds of the nearby Pokfulam Sanatorium, and from there it was introduced to the Hong Kong Botanic Gardens and across the world. Originally described as a new species in 1908, it was subsequently named after the Hong Kong governor Sir Henry Blake, who had a strong interest in botany. The hybrid origin and the parentage of Bauhinia blakeana remains enigmatic. In 1903 the Botanical and Afforestation Department reported "The mysterious origin of the tree and its magnificent flowers at once arrest the interest. … So far, all efforts to identify them with any foreign species have failed". Studies using individual genetic markers— ancestral footprints in the plant’s DNA — have shown that the species is likely a hybrid of two local species, Bauhinia variegata and Bauhinia purpurea, but this has yet to be confirmed at a genomic scale. Further, this unique plant, with its showy tree that flowers much longer and more intensely than its related species, can reveal many other biological secrets concerning its own characteristic and those of other plant species.

Why Genomics?
The human genome project, completed just under 15 years ago, cost ~3 billion US dollars and took ten years to sequence the DNA of a human being. The technology has progressed so rapidly we can now sequence a plant such as Bauhinia for about a millionth of the cost and in a fraction of the time. The legacy of the human genome project is such that technology that was science fiction just a decade or two ago has become a routine part of scientific research and a common component of our medical toolkit. The cost is now is so low that there have already been examples of community funded genome projects in other parts of the world. For example, the Puerto Rican parrot, one of the most endangered species in the world and iconic emblem symbol of the Caribbean island, was sequenced solely through local funding in 2012 to aid the captive breeding program.

Hong Kong has made key contributions to the field field of genomics, local researchers making key breakthroughs in circulating DNA testing, and since 2010 hosting the world’s largest sequencing centre at BGI Hong Kong. Genomics is predicted to produce the biggest "big data" over the next 10 years, and despite Hong Kong being world-leading in producing technologies and data, there is very little awareness and training to capitalise on this. Understanding of the cutting edge work in this rapidly growing field by the Hong Kong public is very poor, with little local awareness as to what it entails, and how it will be soon impacting upon all of their lives. To maximise the benefits to the Hong Kong economy and healthcare system of what will be the growth industry defining the 21st century, a new generation needs to be trained to capitalise on the potential resources here. We’d like to inspire a future generation of genomics data analysts to make Hong Kong a world leader in this field.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your money to kickstart the first "made in Hong Kong genome project, enabling the collection of the necessary data, and inspiring students and others to join this endeavour, learning the skills and what is involved in putting together a genome project.

  • Accomplishing the outlined goals requires funding to cover the chemicals and components for producing the sequencing data for the project. The rest of the labour and analysis costs will be carried out by the contributing team and by BGI Hong Kong and CUHK for free.

  • This is a community project, and we want the community to contribute by finding and reporting specimens, and in assembling the genome (see below).

The Impact

  • Educate the public and help train a new generation of genomics experts in Hong Kong and beyond, able to capitalize and contribute to a new scientific revolution.

  • Making all of the outputs of the project immediately open allows them to be immediately used by others and integrated into educational resources such as wikipedia.

  • This will be the first species in the genus to be sequenced, helping evolutionary biologists resolve where these species fit in the tree of life.

  • Bauhinia is a potential treasure trove for medical research. Previous research has found antibacterial, antidiabetic, analgesic, anti-inflammatory, anti-diarrheal, anti-cancerous, kidney-protective, anti-ulcer and thyroid hormone-regulating properties of many of these species, and characterising the genes is an important step in developing potential new drugs for these conditions.
  • Hybrid genomes are very difficult to study, and this will be an important case study on how to carry out and improve this technological challenge, so that future hybrid organisms can be more easily conquered.

Risks & Challenges

  • This is an ambitious project as plant genomes are very difficult to assemble, and a sequencing a hybrid is even more of a challenge.

  • This is only a draft-quality genome, so more study is needed to produce a high-quality draft. Hopefully this project will be a springboard to enable that.

  • To address these challenges, the scientists involved have an established track record working with Bauhinia and plant genomes, and BGI has sequenced and assembled hundreds of plant genomes, many much larger and more challenging than Bauhinia.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Become a Spotter. Follow the Bauhinias bloom as they come into season this month, and see how many species you can find. Announce your findings by twitter or instagram using the hashtag #Bauhiniawatch when you see this happen and include the geographic location so we can track this across Hong Kong.

  • Join the hunt for Bauhinia seeds. Despite being sterile, in very rare cases Bauhinia blakeana has been seen to produce seed pods. We are very interested in studying this phenomenon, so be sure to let us and the HKU Department of Botany know if you spot any, and we will collect samples. Use the #Bauhiniawatch hashtag on social media to report any sightings.

  • Spread the word. This is a community project and the number of contributors is more important than how much they give. If you love science, Bauhinias and Hong Kong, no contribution is too small.

  • Share this page, follow us on social media, and spread the word with the hashtags #Bauhiniawatch & #HKgenome.

  • Build your own genome. We are looking for volunteers from other universities, students and the public to assemble and analyse this genome data, and are keen to encourage others to follow in our footsteps and launch their own national emblematic genome projects. All data, methods and published output will be made immediately publicly available and open to enable others to learn, repeat and build upon this work.

This is a completely made in Hong Kong project, and we want to involve all sectors of the community – students in the other universities and even work with schools. Everything will be Open Data and the materials used to inspire and train other projects around the world.

UPDATE: We'd like to thank all our supporters to date, especially Bastian Greshake, Liu Chi Man, Henry Hunter, Hallam Stevens, Olivia Rosenman, David Edmunds, Michelle Pardini, Amye Kenall, Nicole Nogoy, Fiona Nielsen, Denisa Kera, Green Glenn Austin, James Rodkey, David McKellar, Taras  Oleksyk, Piya Muqit, Vincent Ng, Michael Bigelow, Terry Wong, Richard Smith Jnr, Hamish Stewart Low, Andrew Davidson, Holly Ganz, Fay-Wei Li, David Young, Laurie Goodman, Ellen Bergen, Jennifer Zarrilli, Thomas Lindsay, Kostas Repanas, Lachlan Coin, Jacob Thorne, Manimozhiyan Arumugam and the Hong Kong Skeptics.

story:
This building last sold in 08' for 15k and is once again in the hands of the city.

After long discussions with some officials who consider it an eye sore I believe it can be purchased for a fraction of that last sale price.(thus the low fund goal).

The way the city sells is you pay 35$ processing/application and then 10% of your bid. this is the second time running this fund and last time 295$ was donated which is not enough to make the city an offer.

I believe 5k would be enough to give it a go.

It will surely take much more money in the future to renovate it but every journey is started with one step.


this campaign's goal is to raise enough to acquire the building from the city

**************YOUR DONATION IS TAX DEDUCTIBLE*******************

the more money we raise the better as the building is sure to need lots of work to just secure it

 -front entry has a collapsed porch

-several windows are broken out

-condition of roof can not be assessed til ownership

with approval I believe this building could be 8-16 apartments.

i have been a landlord since 98' and have been working to get this not for profit off the ground for over 5 years with the help of my lawyer we were finally granted 501 status in June 15'.

all money raised will go into the not for profits bank account until there is enough to make an offer thats realistic for this building.

i am always seeking out buildings for donation as in the past ive had several that were willing to be donated, i just didnt have the status yet due to red tape.

i hope anyone reading this who might want to participate in helping reach out to me. money is great, but so are your two hands and good will.

DESPERATELY SEEKING A GRANT WRITER to help us get off the ground. all money out to get this going has been out of my pocket.

story:
Help + talent = Prosperity of the crowd

We are a team of IT experts and economists of international origin settled down in Spain under MAINSTAP.

Unfortunately, often financial and/or human resources are missing or limited to implement ideas and projects or even realize prototypes. There are thousands of potential ideas of the many thousands of young or free IT, software and computing geniuses from 3D print software to quantum computing reaching out to find your collaboration and support under the roof of The Software Garage.

There is a chance to get all the thousands of workless, destitute developers, tinkerer and (young) engineers together and to use the expertise and talents of each for a better living.

Let us stick and work together to tackle it!


What we need and what you get

We will fund a physical place close to Barcelona, where many engineers and developers can meet and work together with the complementary experts needed to finish new products and developments, i.e. designers, marketing experts, etc.

The Software Garage offers the opportunity to bring the existing talents and experts together and to defy the difficult conditions at the labour market and regarding the current economic environment. Whilst there are many co-working spaces, there is nothing that specific and impacting as the Software Garage. There will be workshops, conferences and other think tank events under the roof of The Software Garage.

Conceptual and desired environment of our The Software Garage, close by city of Barcelona, beaches, nature and international airport.


For different reasons Barcelona is the right location for The Software Garage:

  • Many well educated people with corresponding know how and skills
  • Wide range of leisure and recreational activities incl. cultural sights
  • Location: Logistically well connected (local, national and global)
  • Hotspot for the international software industry (World Mobile Congress)

--> Best preconditions for a conducive atmosphere to work and live.


Participants of The Software Garage will benefit from the network and the think tank events under the roof of The Software Garage. The Interactions between you, software companies, other entrepreneurs and experts will have a positive impact on your business results or even get your business or project started. You will expand the reach of your own project(s) and also get access to new projects. The network and teamwork promotes innovation and where all participants can benefit. I.e. Engineers, scientists and developers and have the chance to become independent entrepreneur in a multi-purpose environment of MAINSTAP HOLDING INC..


Depending on the money you spend you will receive different kind of benefits and gifts:

  • 1€ - Thank you so much for taking the time to support this project. You have made a statement to the world about something that is important to you and your voice will be heard.
  • 5€ - You will receive The Software Garage@Barcelona Button
  • 10€ - 2 Buttons and 3 sticker of the The Software Garage@Barcelona for sharing and spreading
  • 25€ - Software Garage@Barcelona T-Shirt incl. 1 button and 1 sticker
  • 50€ - Wear a hoodie of The Software Garage and walk with pride.
  • 100€ - Ultimate Fan Package which contains t-shirt, hoodie, sticker, button and a patch
  • 1.000€ - Five days free stay at Barcelona and enjoy the life and style of Barcelona incl. a meeting with The Software Garage Team.
  • 5.000€ - Free stay in Barcelona in an exclusive apartment and personal meeting with founder and CEO Horst G Ludwig, the daddy of participative economy and science talents. Further, you will participate of exclusive invitations to conferences.
  • 10.000€ - Free stay in Barcelona in an exclusive apartment and personal meeting with founder and CEO Horst G Ludwig, the daddy of participative economy and science talents. Further, you will participate of exclusive invitations to conferences and you will receive the first month rent at The Software Garage for free.


Use of funds

For the beginning we are assuring investment capital to arrange for a modern and scalable “state of the art” infrastructure. This includes a physical place at a suitable location at Barcelona as well as the IT-infrastructure and office equipment.

The place will be equipped with all that will be needed: conference rooms, secretary’s office, community zones and very flexible working offices.

Besides the infrastructure it’s necessary to announce and promote The Software Garage through marketing campaigns.


Source of funds 

We are asking here at Indiegogo for 850.000 Euros in order to get necessary approvals and entry investments to a selected “state of the art” facility. The more support we get the shorter the timeline will get to welcome you to the Software Garage.  

To achieve our goals we already have additionally capital commitments in place. We also use about 25% of the funds to launch a number of first developments to the benefit of local developers and crowd funders. The participants of The Software Garage shall benefit that’s the reason why we want to get it started and well known here.

We expect finished projects coming out of The Software Garage already by 2015 and 2016 reaching revenue and beyond. Our current members are working on:

  1. improved optical recognition and data processing systems
  2. new global standard for mobile electronic commerce (i.e. the big business apps)
  3. gaming experience
  4. safety concepts
  5. early desease recognition systems
  6. improved live trading platforms
  7. industrial applications
  8. logistics
  9. health support technology
  10. social and cultural encounters
  11. crypto currency systems
  12. virtual reality
  13. A.I.
  14. global crowd banking assistance

...... and growing. 


Currently The Software Garage is a connection/cluster of different companies which collaborate, share ideas, complement and support each other on a virtual basis. There is no common physical working space in place, yet/so far. We would like to expand the existing network and to extend the collaboration with existing and new participants of The Software Garage, also on a common physical basis. Let us use the existing potential of available talents and experts to adapt competencies and to develop and doing business.

More participants --> more work --> more revenue potential




    Team

    The father of the concept is Horst G. Ludwig. With 35 years working experience and one of the few international economists around and specialised in technology, science and NGO affairs he is part of the executive board and he will guide into success and watching out nobody be treated without fairness in regard of his/her input. His lifetime principle and success story is based on "sharing is gaining more with less risk and at a higher speed".


    There are Mario, Christian, Ramón, Rafael, Jonathan, José, Gero, Anthony, Tania, Alberto, Edwin, Frank, Bryan, Miguel, Juan, Franklin, Daniel and those still to come into the board as executive member or as advisor.


    Get in touch

    Be part of The Software Garage network and get access to talented manpower, innovative business ideas and great working atmosphere which is shaped by sharing and participation.

    There will be always a future for those experts seeking for a job, a chance, help for independency under the roof of The Software Garage. 

    We are happy to receive job inquiries, partners and humans convinced that the better future is an issue of DOING IT. 

    Also we will participate at the World Mobil Congress to enhance our network and to get in contact with talents and experts.

    Start and get in touch with us.
